attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is england, when i was young there were lots of c of e churches. Why are they being replaced by mosques, i feel like i am a stranger in my own county. Every day british customers come to me because the are leaving this country and need left hand drive vehicles. wake up to reality we are being taken over. Do something for the british you are the government

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
